page.title: 01Area Summary
page.content: Ours is a rural area. It consists almost entirely of farmland and includes the two small villages of Ladock and Grampound Road. The population is approximately 650. The area lies midway between Plymouth and Land's End and is approximately 11 miles from the North and South coasts. Ladock is 2 miles North West of Grampound Road on the main A39 road. About a mile South of Grampound Road runs the A390 road. The mainline Railway track runs through our area from the North East corner through Grampound Road and down to the South West corner where it crosses the A39 road.The nearest main towns and stations are at Truro and St.Austell which are 6 and 9 miles respectively, away from Ladock. A river flows from North to South passing through Ladock and to the Fal.
